name: basic-tools
description: Basic utility tools: current time, JavaScript evaluation, URL opener, app launcher

tools.name: get_current_time
tools.description: Returns the current date and time of the user's computer.

tools.name: run_javascript
tools.description: Evaluates a JavaScript expression and returns the result. Good for calculations.

tools.name: open_url
tools.description: Opens a URL in the user's default browser. Use for "open browser", "open website", etc.

tools.name: open_application
tools.description: Opens an application on macOS by name. Use for "open Finder", "open Terminal", etc.
